titles.title: Post Office Discontinuance Accountability Act of 2017
Post Office Discontinuance Accountability Act of 2017
A bill to authorize the United States Postal Service to carry out emergency suspensions of post offices in accordance with certain procedures, and for other purposes.
Post Office Discontinuance Accountability Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
